Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, James May
Episodes.Plot: The travelling tent lands on the quayside in Whitby, England where Jeremy, Richard and James introduce a modern take on the traditional Italian grand tour featuring an Aston Martin DB11, a Rolls-Royce Dawn and an uninvited guest.
